nodes.text: "The Size of the Fight" (German title "Es kommt nicht auf die Größe an") is a comic strip written by Jeremy Barlow, drawn by Bob Molesworth and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 29th issue of the German Star Wars Rebels Magazine, which was released on March 15, 2017.
In a Twitter message, Barlow placed this comic shortly after "The Future of the Force" in the second season of Star Wars Rebels.
